All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
Bomb
Bomb item class for the game, is a subclass of item
Cell
Class that constructs a Cell object, which is a single component of a Tile.
Cent
class that creates a Cent object, which inherits from the Loot class
Clock
Class for the clock object in the game
Diamond
Class that creates a Diamond object, inheritance from the superclass Loot
Dollar
Class that creates a Dollar object, inherits from the Loot class
Door
Class that creates a Door object, inherits from the superclass Item
FlyingAssassin
Class that creates a FlyingAssassin, inherits from the superclass NPC
Gate
Class that creates a Gate object and inherits from the Item class
HelloController
To display the message of the day
Item
Class that constructs a general item object, used as a general template for more specifying item objects.
Lever
Class for creating a lever which inherits from the item class
Loot
Abstract class that constructs a general Loot object, used as a general template for more specific loot objects
Main
Main method for the program based on the sample program provided.
Map
Class that holds the Map where the player will play the game
MapReader
Class for reading the text file for levels/maps
MessageOfTheDay
Class for finding the message of the day
NPC
Abstract class that creates a general NPC object, it's used as a template for more specific NPCs
Player
Class that creates a Player object,
PlayerProfile
Class that reads the current Player's status from saved files and handle player input to move or make changes
ProfileFileManager
Class for saving the current state of the program and seeing if the player is new or not and what levels they have unlocked
Ruby
Class that creates a Ruby object, inherits from the Loot class
SaveGame
This class saves current player progress and position of all npcs and items
SmartThief
Class that creates a SmartThief NPC, inherits from the NPC abstract superclass
SmartThiefPath
Class that finds the current goal (item) for the smart thief to follow
SmartThiefSearch
Class for conducting BFS to find a path for the smart thief
Thief
Class that creates a Thief object, inherits from the superclass Character
Tile
Tile class for the game
